name: School Escape Demo
description:
Game created by xTNTMANx

I created this game in hopes to look like an atari game.

This game was created during Weekly Game Jam- Week 99.

Right now, this game is a demo.

For help on the controls, check out the "README" File.

Don't be too harsh, this is my first game/demo.

Apologies for not including music in the game.

*secret* a green key is hidden in the desk at the top right(right in front of the teacher's desk). Just go on the desk, hold space, and walk around with the key.
